snippet: The list of “sexual assault violators on campus,” was quickly scrubbed away, but by early this week it had reappeared on the walls of several other women’s bathrooms around campus.
abstract: List of names described as 'sexual assault violators on campus' has appeared on women's bathroom walls and stacks of fliers at Columbia University; vigilantelike actions are dividing student body at Columbia, where 23 students filed federal complaint accusing university of having inadequate and insensitive process for adjudicating sexual assault cases.
lead_paragraph: The list of “sexual assault violators on campus,” was quickly scrubbed away, but by early this week it had reappeared on the walls of several other women’s bathrooms around campus.

headline.main: List of Names in Sex Assaults Roils Columbia
headline.print_headline: List of Names in Sex Assaults Roils Columbia
